alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 08 at 3:17PM CST until January 08 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN DE SOTO...NORTHWESTERN RED RIVER...SOUTHEASTERN CADDO...SOUTHWESTERN BIENVILLE AND SOUTHEASTERN BOSSIER PARISHES... At 316 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Mansfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ringgold, Hall Summit, Ninock, Carmel, Evelyn, Crichton, Caspiana, Grand Bayou, Mc Dade and Loggy Bayou. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
